summary: I made my character into a handsome follower.
descriptionHtml:
I suggest you Use NMM to download.
He Is inside Jorvasker, he has the same script as Farkas.
This is a requested mod, I hope those who wanted it love it... or him >_> (bad pun).

He starts out wearing prisoner clothing, mostly due to the fact that a follower with clothing already on wont be able to wear something you want them to wear due to the fact that their already wearing something with better armor values... so i gave him something that had the worst, just in case someone wanted to dress him up like a doll.... (me) lol

I will be making more Followers in the future along with Save Games of them.
Please add me to the Forums or on here, Just in case you wanna see what I got in store, or to be kept updated for new mods of mine.

Recommended Mods:
Frost Fall http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163
Alternate Start - Live another Life http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557
Omegared99 - Armor Compilation http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10277
Ultimate HD Fire Effects http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28642
Unreal Cinema - The Directors Cut - ENB http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34127
Covereyes http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869
Pretty Eyes http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3424
High Quality Eyes http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498
Realistic Eyes 2 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26038

Those Eye Mods will give you around 250 Different Eyes.... A lot of options, trust me, you\'ll find the eyes you dream of!

Better males and Hair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488
Better Vanilla Hairs - Mesh Replacements http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28491#
Fallout Hair Pack Fixed with NPCEditor Support http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22816
^Mostly Recommended for Girls, the male hairs look... weird >_>

Smooth male body normal map - Better Males Sundracon:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26145 

I appreciate Endorsements, please :)
Credit goes to Pheo3309, They helped me fix most of the issues going on with making the follower.
author: Me
